title: Buoyant Force - Force on submerged cubes

content.question: What is the relationship between <math alttext="F sub 1" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <msub> <mi>F</mi> <mn>1</mn> </msub> </mstyle> </math> and <math alttext="F sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="F sub 1 equals, one half F sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="F sub 1 equals F sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="F sub 1 equals, the square root of 2, end root, times F sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="F sub 1 equals 2 F sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="F sub 1 equals 2 F sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
